advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
El Nuevo Día, the leader in news, local and digital content in Puerto Rico is available on the iPhone.

Stay informed about the latest news and entertainment information, while on the go. The El Nuevo Día application is designed for iPhone and iPod Touch. All the information you need is just a click away, with the most complete coverage of Puerto Rico and world news. Share our content with your friends via e-mail, Facebook and Twitter and receive our push notifications so you never miss a thing.

Be the reporter. The El Nuevo Día iPhone Application allows you to share news or information that you witness with the editorial team of El Nuevo Día and ENDI. You only need to access the Caza Noticias section and enable the camera feature of your phone.

You will also have access to local movie listings, your horoscope, local lottery numbers and the most complete database of restaurants in Puerto Rico.

The El Nuevo Día iPhone App is a free application that gives you access to the most popular sections like news, movies, lottery, and more!

Sections:

Noticias/News
The most complete news coverage of Puerto Rico, World, Business, Entertainment, Sports, Lifestyle, Lottery, and user generated news. Share our content with your friends via e-mail, Facebook and/or Twitter

Caza Noticias
Capture. Send. Report. If you witness any event that is news or information we should know about, send it to El Nuevo Dia. Use a picture from your  gallery or use your iPhone’s camera and easily send it to the editorial team of El Nuevo Dia and ENDI.

Cartelera/Movies
Find the complete movie listings for Puerto Rico. Find theaters close to your location (via GPS), get theater’s information (address, phone number and map their location), and set your favorites theaters. Find listings by locations or by movies. Watch trailers of your favorite movies.

Horóscopo/Horoscope
Do you want to know what your future holds? Find your daily horoscope, get your lucky numbers, and personalize your experience by selecting your sign so it shows up first on the list.

Clima/Weather
Find updated weather information for your location or change the location manually. Get the current weather, 4 days forecast, radar and satellite information.

Fotos/Photos
Have access to different photo galleries of each news section.

Videos
View news through our videos available for each news section

Sal.pr
Access the most complete database of restaurants in Puerto Rico. Search by location, type of food, ambience and budget. Choose the option you want. Download the Sal iPhone Application or access the Sal mobile website.
